'''Brian Haines''' ([[9 May|May 9]], [[1921]] - [[25 July|July 25]], [[1991]]) was a British actor. 

==Roles==
* [[1968]] - [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1968 radio series)]] - [[Bifur]], [[Bert]],  [[Dáin Ironfoot]]
* [[1981]] - [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]] - [[Uglúk]]
